description: A fictionalized account of the young life of Hans Christian Andersen, a young man with a penchant for storytelling but struggles to find his place in the world and gain the affection of the woman he adores. Interspersed throughout...
keywords: snow adventure,charles dickens character,hans christian andersen character,lifting someone into the air,nightingale
name: Hans Christian Andersen: My Life as a Fairy Tale

original_info.id: Hans Christian Andersen: My Life as a Fairy Tale_2001
original_info.name: Hans Christian Andersen: My Life as a Fairy Tale

review.name: GREAT MOVIE with NEW FACES
review.reviewBody: I am enjoying watching this movie that has been recently reshown on the Hallmark Channel. How refreshing to watch a film that doesn't have foul language,etc. and tells the wonderful tale in a dramatic form of Hans' life.......I also admired the new actor who played Hans......we hope to see him in other theatrical productions or films sometime soon.......Thanks Hallmark for showing it again on tv!!!!!!
